title.rendered: Intellectsoft is a Global Software Development Leader, Outruns Nearly 1000 Companies

content.rendered:
Palo Alto, California, January 9, 2019 — Intellectsoft, a digital transformation consulting boutique and software solutions provider, today announced that it has been recognized as a ‘Global Leader’ in software engineering based on the ability to deliver and verified client feedback. For the second straight year, Clutch, a worldwide B2B research, ratings, and reviews company for small and mid-size IT and business services providers, puts Intellectsoft in its annual Global Leaders list that analyses worldwide companies. 

Clutch’s  mission is to aid buyers of technology services and solutions in their selection of reputable qualified service providers. Clutch’s scoring algorithm is based on a company’s ability to generate the highest quality of service, the most recent verified customer reviews, clients served, complexity of the engagement, and brand reputation and visibility. The annual report recognizes B2B service providers across multiple categories, including mobile and software developers (Augmented and Virtual Reality, Artificial Intelligence, Internet of Things, Blockchain, Chatbots). Besides the Global Leaders list, Intellectsoft was also featured as a top blockchain company and one of the top mobile app development companies.

From funded startups to Fortune 500 companies, for over 11 years, Intellectsoft has been helping businesses to overcome the challenges of Digital Transformation by building impactful software powered by the latest technologies. Throughout 2018, Intellectsoft has strengthened its position as a high-end technology consulting boutique, gaining new enterprise-grade clients from multiple industries and helping with their transformational initiatives through implementation of technologies like Digital Ledgers, Cognitive Computing, Cloud IoT, and more.

Here are some Clutch reviews from Intellectsoft’s clients:

“They managed their team well and made sure we understood what was being worked on.” — EuroAccident, Sweden’s leading insurance company.

“We never got the impression that we were dealing with anything less than top-shelf experts.” — Cirruspath, the company behind Cirrus Insight.

“[Intellectsoft] always finds time to look into new things for us and have demonstrated a real willingness to react quickly to change.” — Eurostar, UK’s railway pioneer.

“Intellectsoft has a robust team, providing experts in every field we required.” – VP, Woodside Hotels

Clutch’s sister website, The Manifest, also named Intellectsoft one of the best blockchain companies. The Manifest is a resource that provides industry reports, how-to-guides, and lists of top service providers across various industries. Intellectsoft has earned the spot due to high quality of blockchain solutions, reliable delivery, and prominence on the market.

excerpt.rendered: We become a Global Software Development Leader for the second straight year.
